ChangelogEntry.Title: Export feature
ChangelogEntry.Description: You can now export any selection of SRS items in the Item Browsing part of the SRS tab.

ChangelogEntry.Title: WaniKani import feature
ChangelogEntry.Description: You can now import your items from WaniKani in the import menu.

ChangelogEntry.Title: Next review date editing
ChangelogEntry.Description: You can now edit the next review date of any item individually in its edition window.

ChangelogEntry.Title: Auto-skip option
ChangelogEntry.Description: A new option under Settings > SRS allows you to automatically skip to the next question upon entering a correct answer.

ChangelogEntry.Title: Minor additions and fixes
ChangelogEntry.Description: • Vocab with an outdated reading now appear on a semi-transparent gray background. • The 60 character limit on the kanji writing field for vocab SRS items has been lifted. • Typing "_" in kana fields will now input a "ー". • Fixed SRS item modification during reviews causing spaces to appear between their meanings. • Fixed Houhou crashing when using items above the maximal SRS level. • Fixed a crash occuring for some users when using the "Copy" button in vocab lists. • Fixed a selection bug occuring when navigating through kanji by clicking characters in a vocab list.

ChangelogEntry.Title: New ignore shortcuts setting
ChangelogEntry.Description: Added an SRS setting to enable some new shortcuts during reviews to ignore a submitted answer.

ChangelogEntry.Title: Small SRS items browsing improvements
ChangelogEntry.Description: SRS item browsing now has slightly improved filters and performs better.

ChangelogEntry.Title: Minor additions and fixes
ChangelogEntry.Description: • During reviews, meaning questions now handle meanings with parenthesis expressions (e.g. "master (of a house)" will accept "master"). • Clicking a reading on a kanji page will now filter vocab using the clicked reading. • Changed the SRS progress display on items to display the progression through your SRS levels. • Changed the background color of the answer box after validating your answer during reviews to be more flashy. • Typing "zz" in kana fields will now input the small tsu (っ). • Typing "n'" in kana fields will now input a ん. • Typing ca/ci/cu/ce/co in kana fields will now input か/き/く/け/こ. • Fixed bulk SRS item edition with too many items.

ChangelogEntry.Title: User folder modification
ChangelogEntry.Description: New feature: you can now move your user folder wherever you want. For example, synchronize your SRS database by using a Dropbox folder.

ChangelogEntry.Title: CSV import
ChangelogEntry.Description: New feature: import SRS items from a CSV file.
